note.label: With the conversion pixel the extension is able to record the placed orders your shop. This makes it possible to position populair products better, this greatly enhances your conversion. In addition, you get better insights in the orders and the assigned commission.

product_id.label: Product ID
product_id.comment: Product ID's are generated by TradeTracker and are used to select the profit margin per group. You can overwrite the default product ID on category level under Catalog » Manage Categories » Select Category » Feeds » TradeTracker Product ID.

note.label: This section lists all the available attributes for the Feed. To avoid errors in the feed please make sure that you provide the most attributes.

stock_limit.label: Limit stock at
stock_limit.tooltip: Maximum quantity of stock to be sent, everything above this value will be sent as this limit

extra_info.label: Extra info
extra_info.comment: Like eg: Free pickup from store

default_category.label: Use multiple attributes
default_category.comment: Will be used on empty results
default_category.tooltip: Use the > symbol to separate the attributes and hide the attribute when empty.

category_tradetracker_default.label: Default Category
category_tradetracker_default.tooltip: This category will be used when there is no TradeTracker category specified on category level.

extra_note.label: You can add custom-fields to your feed when needed. Please make sure that your using the latest Custom Fields standards To prevent error messages in the feed. The guidelines for the custom-fields can be found right in our Knowledgebase.

tax_note.label:
By default prices are shown incl. Tax so only change this option if necessary.
If the feed export is without tax it's possible to add it with this option.

tax_percentage.label: Percentage
tax_percentage.comment: When the tax percentage is 21% use 21.

configurable_note.label: Export non visible simple products of configurable and grouped products.

simple_price.label: Use Simple Product Pricing
simple_price.comment: Only enable this option when you have enabled an extension that is using the simple prices in your store.

conf_switch_urls.label: Configurable Switch Urls
conf_switch_urls.comment: Create a specific url for the simple products inside the configurable products to make sure the prices and information is correct when using the link.

note.label: This option allows you to include/exclude categories or out of stock products from the Tradetracker Feed. To exclude specific products from the Tradetracker feed you easily select yes in the Tradetracker tab on your product configuration page.

Each store view will have their own feed, you can easily activate or de-activate the feed generation on store level or automatically generate the feed. In case your not using the cron job functionality it's possible to generate the feed manually.

log_generation.label: Save summary to log
log_generation.comment: Write the summary of each feed generation to the var/log/tradetracker.log file

paging.label: Paging
paging.comment: Recommend for big catalogs, e.g. catalogs of 50.000 SKU, use 5.000 per page.

limit.label: Limit per Page
limit.comment: Use the paging function on big catalogs, e.g. catalogs of 50.000 SKU, you can use 5.000 per page.

debug_memory.label: Debug Memory Usage
debug_memory.comment: Write the memory usage to the var/log/tradetracker.log file

bypass_flat.label: Bypass Flat Product Tables
bypass_flat.comment: It's not recommended to activate this option in production mode.

overwrite.label: Overwrite Server Settings
overwrite.tooltip: Only use this option if it's necessary to overwrite this setting because of your server memory limit or execution time.

memory_limit.label: Memory Limit
memory_limit.comment: This overwrites the maximum amount of memory in bytes that a script is allowed to allocate, eg: 1024M.

max_execution_time.label: Max Execution Time
max_execution_time.comment: This overwrites the maximum time in seconds a script is allowed to run before it is terminated by the parser, eg: 300 (for 5 minutes).
